title: The Tarnished Shooter
description: Author, Charles James gives a stunning account of surviving adversity. A young boy named Frank goes through life looking on the bright side, while his father does everything in his power to destroy the boys spirit. This is a compelling story about the long term consequences of childhood trauma and abuse. It's also a story about human nature, adventure and reconciliation.Frank eventually wades through all the crap and finds a path to a better future.
author: Charles  James
